name: MISSION (PUZE)
description:
MISSION

BY PUZE

_____________________________________________________________

Drive your spaceship, Avoid the obstacles and save the lost astronauts!

If you touch a malus (an astronaut with a red cross) you'll lose 1 point!

_____________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

USE YOUR MOUSE TO MOVE YOUR SPACESHIP

USE SPACE TO SHOOT: YOU HAVE ONLY 5 SHOTS AVAILABLE. GRAB AMMOS FALLING DOWN TO ADD 1 AMMO.

USE LEFT DOUBLE CLICK TO BECOME IMMORTAL FOR 5 SECONDS. 

TO BECOME IMMORTAL AGAIN YOU HAVE TO WAIT 15 SECONDS OF COOLDOWN, SHOWN IN THE BOTTOM-CENTER OF THE SCREEN.

_____________________________________________________________

PRODUCED BY EMANUELE ALFIERI

PUZE 2021
